titles.title: To designate the Federal building located at 711 Washington Street in Boston, Massachusetts, as the "Jean Mayer Human Nutrition Research Center on Aging".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Mr. Nadler moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Considered under suspension of the rules.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Received in the Senate, read twice.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

bill.summary: 4/13/1994--Introduced. Designates the Federal building located at 711 Washington Street, Boston, Massachusetts, as the Jean Mayer Human Nutrition Research Center on Aging.
